text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 38G – 

conduct of RT-PCR tests – prescribed persons) (Covid-19) Regulations 2021.

title: conduct of RT-PCR tests – prescribed persons) (Covid-19) Regulations 2021.
heading: 2. The Health Service Executive is prescribed as a person approved by the
text_raw:
2. The Health Service Executive is prescribed as a person approved by the 

Minister to conduct RT-PCR tests. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 March, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [144] 3

title: conduct of RT-PCR tests – prescribed persons) (Covid-19) Regulations 2021.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These regulations prescribe the HSE as the persons approved by the Minister 
for Health to conduct RT-PCR tests with applicable travellers in designated 
facilities under section 38G (1) (e) (inserted by section 7 of the Health 
(Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021) of the Health Act 1947. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [144]
